file_content.text: That's all for now, folks! If you're watching from home, be sure to stay tuned for Mysteries of Galactic Science, with special host Fez Burba!
Was your favorite player mangled beyond recognition today? Order a deluxe holorecording of the match and cherish those brutal moments forever!
We're out of here, folks! I'm Baron Deathmark, wishing you a Hutt-tastic day!
No kicking the Huttball!
Who just kicked that? What is wrong with you!?
I've seen some dirty moves, but kicking the huttball? That's just low!
Today's grappling blasters were provided by Galactic Solutions Industries. Mention my name and save five percent off anything in the latest GSI catalog!
Cleanup droids provided by Automata Galactica. Don't just clean your stains: obliterate them with the latest models from Automata Galactica!
Pulse-pounding matches like this are available with commentary in glorious Huttese! Contact your local content provider for more information!
Time is running out! If there's someone you haven't hurt yet, get it done!
Neutral ball! Who's gonna go for it first?
Rotworms have the ball!
A Rotworm takes the ball!
Flawless Rotworm pass!
Rotworm pass is all clear!
Rotworms have just taken the record for worst pass in history!
Was that supposed to be a pass? Get it together, Rotworms!
Frog-Dog pass goes right into Rotworm hands! Perfect interception!
Rotworms intercept the ball! Will the Frog-Dogs make them pay for it?
The sludge claims a Rotworm! What a mess!
Rotworms lose one to the sludge! Hope they brought a bucket!
Rotworm down! Brutal!
Pow! One less Rotworm!
Frog-Dogs totally mangled a Rotworm! It's chaos out there, folks!
Not much left of that Rotworm!
Frog-Dogs just stomped a Rotworm! They are not holding back!
The Rotworms score!
Scoring play by the Rotworms! One point!
Score! Rotworms are hungry for the win!
Rotworm victory!
Rotworms are today's big winners! Congratulations, Rotworms!
Rotworms take the win! Amazing game!
Rotworms completely stomp the opposition six to nothing! What a bloodbath!
Frog-Dogs take the ball!
The Frog-Dogs have the ball!
Beautiful pass by the Frog-Dogs!
Frog-Dog pass connects! Nice play!
Frog-Dog throws the ball... nowhere! What a failure!
Incomplete pass! What are the Frog-Dogs doing out there?
Frog-Dog interception! Rotworms are gonna be out for blood!
Frog-Dogs intercept the ball! Can they keep it?
Can Frog-Dogs swim in toxic sludge? Doesn't look like it!
That Frog-Dog just got sludged! Nasty!
That is one mangled Frog-Dog!
Frog-Dog down! Rotworms are showing no mercy!
There goes a Frog-Dog! Messy!
Rotworms just pulverized a Frog-Dog!
Ouch! Rotworms just gave that Frog-Dog something to think about!
The Frog-Dogs score!
One point for the Frog-Dogs!
Frog-Dogs score with a beautiful play!
Frog-Dogs have won the match! Let's hear it for 'em!
This one goes to the Frog-Dogs! What a game!
Frog-Dogs win!
Six to zero, Frog-Dogs win by total domination! A truly inspiring massacre!
Rotworms! Frog-Dogs! Go!
I'm your host, Baron Deathmark! Everyone knows the rules: two teams, selected by random draw. The Frog-Dogs, and the Rotworms!
One ball: grab it, pass it, or run it! Grappling blasters can be used to climb the arena floors! Toxic sludge pipes can be used to die painfully!
Just get the ball over the enemy team's goal line any way you can to score a point!
Murder? Encouraged! Cheating? Of course! Cannibalism? You can be the first!
Just be sure to honor our host, Giradda the Hutt, and never kick the ball!
People of Quesh! Viewers from across the galaxy! It's time... for... Huttball!
Die-hard fans! Puny newcomers! Gentlebeings everywhere! Let's... play... Huttball!
Welcome to the planet Quesh! We've got poisonous gas! Vicious wildlife! And the deadliest game in the galaxy... Huttball!
